property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While it's true most Dragons are cruel, the Shivan Dragon seems to take particular glee in the misery of others, often tormenting its victims much like a cat plays with a mouse before delivering the final blow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of your library. As many times as you choose, you may pay 1 life, put those cards on the bottom of your library in any order, then look at the top five cards of your library. Then shuffle and put the last cards you looked at this way on top in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is said that the wind will blow the world past if you wait long enough.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a soot counter on Smokestack. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a permanent for each soot counter on Smokestack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return Squee, Goblin Nabob from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. {3}: Put target Rebel card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Genesis is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "First through the Riftstone was Genesis - and the world was lifeless no more." - *Scroll of Beginnings*

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - When Chrome Mox enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonartifact, nonland card from your hand. {T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a creature spell this turn, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dosan sat in repose for many hours. He made no motion, no sound at all. And as he sat, nature revealed itself to him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though lesser well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boro Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We see the same sky as you, just through a different lens."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap three untapped Elves you control: Add {G}{G}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Study the great spirits of our age and those of the past. Prune secrets from the branching traceries of our lineage." - Twila, Gilt-Leaf archdruid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A blazing sun that never sets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({PG} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.) {1}{PG}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Exile target land card from a graveyard. Add one mana of any color. {B}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard. Each opponent loses 2 life. {G}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. −3: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater. −7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have flying."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Siege Rhino enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mere approach of an Abzan war beast is enough to send enemies fleeing in panic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Dragonlord Ojutai has hexproof as long as it's untapped. Whenever Dragonlord Ojutai deals combat damage to a player, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Creatures and nonbasic lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Salvation will not be granted by the Lunarch Council. It must be earned - at the edge of a sword, if necessary."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. [+1]: Each opponent exiles two cards from their hand. −4: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh deals 7 damage to target opponent, creature an opponent controls, or planeswalker an opponent controls. −12: Exile each nonland permanent your opponents control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've cast three or more instant and sorcery spells this turn, return Arclight Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters the battlefield, mill four cards. {T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create an X/X blue Shark creature token with flying, where X is that spell's mana value. Cycling {X}{1}{U} ({X}{1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Shark Typhoon, create an X/X blue Shark creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Elite Spellbinder enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand. You may exile a nonland card from it. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may play it. A spell cast this way costs {2} more to cast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninjutsu {3}{B} ({3}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever Nashi, Moon Sage's Scion deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of each player's library. Until end of turn, you may play one of those cards. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof Lotus Field enters the battlefield tapped. When Lotus Field enters the battlefield, sacrifice two lands. {T}: Add three mana of any one color.
